item.title: Shortcodes.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcodes that are tied to a particular theme? Lame. That's why we made the super-duper awesome ZillaShortcodes plugin. Use it with any theme. Work with a ThemeZilla theme and we'll style it to match. Nice!

Buttons

[zilla_button url="" style="grey" size="small" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="blue" size="small" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="red" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="purple" size="small" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="black" size="small" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="green" size="small" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="grey" size="medium" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="blue" size="medium" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="red" size="medium" type="round"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="orange" [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="grey" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="blue" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="red" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="orange" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="light-blue" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="purple" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="black" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button] [zilla_button url="" style="green" size="large" type="square"] Button [/zilla_button]

Tabs

Alerts

[zilla_alert style="white"] This is a standard alert message. [/zilla_alert] [zilla_alert style="grey"] This is grey alert message [/zilla_alert] [zilla_alert style="red"] This is an imminent danger message! [/zilla_alert] [zilla_alert style="yellow"] Warning: Almost in danger message alert! [/zilla_alert] [zilla_alert style="green"] Dude, chillax. S'all good. [/zilla_alert]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Why tie shortcodes to a theme? Make 'em portable with ZillaShortcodes.

item.title: Archives.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This theme comes packed with a simple archives template. To use it, simply create a new page and select "Archives" page template in the Page Attributes menu – the archive lists will automatically display below any page content. Lists include the last 30 posts, archives by month and archives by subject.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Old articles are just as important as new ones.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Born to Die

item.title: Contact form 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your Name (required)
[text* your-name]

Your Email (required)
[email* your-email]

Subject
[text your-subject]

Your Message
[textarea your-message]

[submit class:button class:radius "Submit"]

[your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Bearded (http://themes.bonfirelab.com/bearded) hermanto@bonfirelab.com [your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> Message Body: [your-message] -- This e-mail was sent from a contact form on Bearded (http://themes.bonfirelab.com/bearded) [your-email] Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Please fill the required field. Email address seems invalid. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. Your entered code is incorrect. Your answer is not correct. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late.
